name: places/ChIJ89S1IrBZwokRkHcBzsi1u5U
formattedAddress: 230 W 74th St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 230 W 74th St, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text:
The colonoscopy prep instructions were sent to me via voicemail and text and I followed them to the letter. Turns out the prep instructions were not right for me and I needed something more customized. Dr. Gottlieb was not able to complete the colonoscopy successfully and told me I would need to repeat the procedure - after being on the toilet all night and taking time off work. She told me that her staff was supposed to call and speak to me and come up with a customized prep plan for each patient, but I never had that conversation with anyone, just cookie-cutter instructions.

A nurse told me afterward that he always recommends patients fast the entire day before the procedure rather than starting at noon as I'd been instructed. That information really was not helpful to me AFTER the procedure. Why hasn't this office modified the instructions they are sending patients to indicate that they should fast all day so that they have the best chance of success?

Worse, Dr. Gottlieb suggested that I complain to her staff. I don't understand why she didn't address this with her staff directly to make sure it doesn't happen to other patients.

I expected significantly better care from Upper West Side Endoscopy which is part of Mount Sinai.

originalText.text: What can I say? This Colonoscopy Clinic simply ROCKS! From the door to the Doc and everything in between I was blown aware by the care I received here. Dr. Daniel Samuel and his amazing team are unsurpassed in rendering the utmost services. It was my first procedure (routine) my doctor prescribed me for my annual and age-related tests/screenings so I was a ‘fraidy cat’ going in but thanks to the care and professionalism of Chris, Anna, Ross, and Dr. Daniel my worries were put to rest. Awesome Team assembled here and I highly recommend this practice.

originalText.text: I honestly had a great experience here 2 weeks ago, and this is coming from someone who has anxiety and panic attacks. They were extremely nice and funny with me, and made my experience very comfortable and seamless. Just remember that your energy and attitude will definitely influence how people treat you wherever you go!

originalText.text: Great experience here. Clean and modern facility. No wait - walked in and was taken in right away. Nurses were all great as was anesthesiologist. Highly recommend.

text.text: Great experience here. Clean and modern facility. No wait - walked in and was taken in right away. Nurses were all great as was anesthesiologist. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: While the facility and waiting room are clean,  I was not happy with the service of their anesthesiologist. After that experience, I told my G.I. I would rather have the endoscopy done in the hospital.
